code:
[BEGIN]
```verilog
module TopModule (
    input logic clk,
    input logic w,
    input logic R,
    input logic E,
    input logic L,
    output logic Q
);

    always @(posedge clk) begin
        if (R) begin
            Q <= 1'b0; // Reset Q to 0
        end else if (L) begin
            Q <= 1'b1; // Load value R (1'b1 for this example)
        end else if (E) begin
            Q <= w; // Shift operation
        end
    end

    initial begin
        Q = 1'b0; // Initialize Q to 0
    end

endmodule
```
[DONE]
